page.title: 05Rogart - Housing
page.content: I live ion a seventy year old stone croft house. Eight years ago, a kitchen extension was built. In the kitchen, there are cupboards, a fridge, table, chairs, couch, telephone, sink and Rayburn. About fifteen years ago a bathroom extension was built. In the sitting-room, there is a peat fire. My house contains another five rooms. Outside, there are lots of sheds where the dogs and implements are stored. My house is a semi-detached council house in the village of Rogart. It has a small kitchen containing cupboards, fridge, cooker and washing-machine. In the sitting-room there is a peat and coal fire. My house has another three rooms. Outside, there is a small shed for keeping odds and ends.
